name: Treasure Hunt!
description:
Goal: Find as much treasure as you can before getting blobbed. 

Movement: Arrow Keys or Numpad (can move in 8 directions)

Interaction: Space bar to check a chest for treasure.

Full-screen: for better viewing :)
